title: Don't Blame The New York Judge Who Referred Alleged Cop Killer To A Drug Program
text:
Published By: Huffington Post NY - Today 
A New York judge is taking on the mayor and police chief over a decision he made last year -- and it turns out the law is on his side. Manha... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
